about.me: We are a partnership of two folks living in Toronto. Mike, brings his experience as a technical lead at multiple data and analytics organizations. He designs and builds cloud-based data warehouses, largely intended to  analyze big data. Vivek brings to bear more than a decade of experience in data and analytics, as well as marketing strategy and execution. With strong industry experience and a passion for cryptocurrency, we can confidently move forward with this venture and responsibly manage this Canadian Cardano stake pool.
about.server: Our infrastructure is hosted on AWS in the Canada Central region. Detailed information about our architecture and security is provided on our website. Our pools are CANUK, CNUK2 and CNUK3
about.company: We are a Canadian Cardano stake pool. Our goal is to create a great staking experience focused on a strong, vibrant community
